TopicTitle: [WIP][1.6.x_TEMPORARY FIX] NAS - Naval Artillery System 0.7.0 (BDAc Addon, WW2 Naval Weapons) - "Land of Dragon" - 2018/4/28

Articles.Content: Ello i have been trying to get this mod to work on KSP 1.4.5 which it says its compatible and i dont have cal yet it freezes on every part from it and i dont know why but its rather sad

been playing KSP 1.4.5, and like cadmaus its not working properly, no matter what I do, the parts simply don't show up. I have BDA, SMindustries pack, and maritime pack (with all the requirments, such as firespitter.dll)

something wrong or am I missing something?
Does this work with BD Armory for Runway Project?
The mod is extremely outdated so it's most likely incompatible with runway project

I. With permission from acea, updated the torpedos to have sonar guidance. The patch and guns are okay (idk what to do to update everything else and would like to seek help on that). The torpedos work fine and can now lock onto ships.

On 1/23/2022 at 3:58 PM, brokenbolt said:

The mod is extremely outdated so it's most likely incompatible with runway project

It still works fine
the turrets aren't really doing any hitpoint damage

On 9/25/2022 at 12:59 AM, universe72 said:

the turrets aren't really doing any hitpoint damage

this mod was made way before the hitpoint system was implemented. it haven't been updated for a very long time. it will likely need to be overhauled to get it to work again
is anyone else having an issue where the torpedoes can not be placed in the editor?
